papers.title: Turnover of developers in libre software projects
papers.authors: Robles, G., González-Barahona, J. M., et al.
papers.relevance: Empirical study showing how developer turnover affects project sustainability and core team composition

semantic_scholar_match.title: Contributor Turnover in Libre Software Projects
semantic_scholar_match.venue: International Conference on Open Source Systems

citations.reasoning: These papers provide empirical evidence of how developer turnover directly reduces core developer capacity through knowledge loss and reduced project continuity.

papers.title: The social structure of free and open source software development
papers.relevance: Documents how core developer availability enables effective mentorship and knowledge sharing

semantic_scholar_match.title: The social structure of free and open source software development

citations.reasoning: These studies demonstrate that larger core developer populations increase mentorship capacity and facilitate implicit knowledge transfer through social structures and coordination mechanisms.
